Docs.param: The identifier of the resource to which extension topic is queried. The scope can be a subscription, or a resource group, or a top level resource belonging to a resource provider namespace. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}' for Azure resource.
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: Get properties of an extension topic.
